title: Signal
summary: A signal draws attention to notifications and new content.

overview.title: Usage
overview.section-content: The signal is mainly used on buttons and menu buttons. The signal's style matches the button's rank and variant by default.

overview.title: Example
overview.section-content: On the intranet we use the signal on the “What is new”-button to indicate a new function or feauture has been released. The button will trigger a popover with more information about what is new.
